attributes.action: Call for the PM to not interfere with HMRC's action against Rangers FC
attributes.additional_details: In response to petition #29635 (Call for the Prime Minister to intervene in the HMRC v Rangers Football Club tax issue), we the undersigned would like to remind the Prime Minister that he is sworn to defend the law, including the requirement for all individuals and businesses in the UK to comply with the rules and regulations of HMRC, and we seek an assurance that he will let the law run its own course, free from explicit or implicit pressure from Her Majesty's Government.
